entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023
